markers.title: Stephenson Park Pool
markers.description: My son Sydney playing in the wading pool when he was a toddler. (Marker and pencil)

markers.title: East Side of Stephenson Avenue
markers.description: Looking east along Stephenson Avenue on a slushy spring day. (Marker, pen and pencil crayon)

markers.title: 126 Stephenson Avenue
markers.description: Pigeons hanging out on roof, one winter afternoon. (Marker, pen and pencil crayon)

markers.title: Looking South from Westlake Avenue
markers.description: Interesting shadows on Westlake Avenue, facing Stephenson. (Pen and pencil crayon)

markers.title: Stephenson Park Playground
markers.description: My son Sydney as a toddler at the playground on a fall afternoon. (Marker, pen and pencil crayon)

markers.title: North Side of Stephenson Avenue at Westlake
markers.description: Sydney standing next to fallen tree branches, following a big storm. (Marker, pen and pencil crayon)
